snippet.title: The Smurfs – Dreams – Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
🌟 Discover Smurfs Dreams, a dreamlike adventure where every dream hides a mystery to unveil! 🌈

🚀 Dive into a fantastic world alongside your favorite Smurfs in this unique 3D platform game developed by Ocellus Services. Watch the teaser announcement for a taste of this incredible adventure! 🔍

Wishlist on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2602020/The_Smurfs__Dreams/
PlayStation:  https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10010426
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/p/smurfs-dream-3e8f70
GOG : https://www.gog.com/en/game/the_smurfs_dreams

💤 In Smurfs Dreams, Gargamel has cast a devious spell plunging our blue friends into a deep sleep. Your mission? Awaken all the Smurfs before Gargamel manages to reach the village! 🌟

🎮 Play solo or cooperatively with a friend for an even more fun experience! Explore 4 dreamlike worlds featuring 12 levels and 16 mini-levels filled with puzzles and surprises to discover. Wake up the sleeping Smurfs and customize your character with new clothes and accessories for total immersion in the Smurf universe! 🍄

🎉 Smurfs Dreams will be available at the end of 2024 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series, Nintendo Switch and PC. Don't miss this magical adventure that will plunge you into the heart of the Smurfs' wildest dreams! 🌠

📣 Stay tuned for more information very soon! And don't forget to follow us on our social networks so you don't miss out on any Microids and Les Schtroumpfs news! 🌐
